caseTitle: Olas Khan v. NAB thr. its Chairman and others
tagline: PC-1, all the work orders, cheques, monitoring reports etc. placed on record were signed and issued by petitioner Olas Khan during his tenure as the Project Director of a government scheme. He, in the given circumstances, is not entitled to bail. In the other petition, NAB was not able to show any extraordinary or exceptional circumstances that may warrant recall of the order of the grant of bail by the High Court to respondent Saibzada Alamgir.
